ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: XP bonus?
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL not on Rodcet, except a few of us old school folks on crap puters. I go to places like Sol A bc there s fewer assholes, hubby and I can hold any camp in
ygData.messageBody:
LOL not on Rodcet, except a few of us old school folks on crap puters. I go
to places like Sol A bc there's fewer assholes, hubby and I can hold any
camp in zone except the king, the exp is still workable and the cash is
nice. We're also usually the only ones around except maybe a cleric going
for Lord Gimp.
----- Original Message -----
From: Chris Talbot <chris@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, September 24, 2003 3:49 PM
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: XP bonus?


> Thanks to those who responded to my question about XP bonuses.
>
> Just out of curiosity, does the XP bonus actually entice more people to go
> to the zones that have the bonus? I've started hunting the far upper
levels
> in The Befallen (on Tarew Marr server) and I've typically been the only
one
> in the entire zone.
>
> Chris
>
>
>
>
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
